name: aki-sta
description: 空きスタサーチくん - モノリポ管理用

scripts.start: npm run setup && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:all: npm run setup && concurrently -n "backend,frontend,scraper" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:scraper"
scripts.start:frontend: wait-on http://localhost:7071 && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.test: npm run setup && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:scraper && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:api
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && npm run lint:api -- --fix
scripts.test:all: concurrently -n "backend,frontend,scraper,e2e" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:scraper" "npm run test:e2e"
